comment: pretty useless.  he walks around looking at everyones drawings and sees your work during class and instead of telling you that you are doing it wrong (so that you learn) he just keeps walking like its all good.  then when you go to turn in your work, you be surprised to see a 82 on a simple assignment only because he doesnt help!!!!

Not a good professor. Cocky. Doesn't show interest in being in class and is always checking his phone...rude. Doesn't have an imagination. Never understands students' work unless it's a box. Hence lack of imagination. If you're into simple designs go for it. If you like complex ideas... he is absolutely no help.

Jay Mo is a great teacher and a cool person.  He gives a lot of one-on-one time to make sure you understand what you are doing. And if you don't, he gives you great suggestions that makes sense. A great teacher to start off your architecture career.

Jay-mo is an excellent teacher.  i learned more from his class this semester than i did from my other professor last semester.  He spends a lot of time making sure everyone understands the assignment and gives great ideas.
Really AWESOME teacher, just make sure you listen!
